Posts.EditableText:
> when I select 'expression' as per the tutorial there is no drop down

What drop down should there be? Select 'Expression' and type in any expression you want.

If you want to choose one of the preconfigured options, you need to choose that instead of 'expression' (although I think that choosing one of them and then changing the type to 'expression' will let you see the expression that represents that condition)
